public static class Management.TreeInfo
extends Management.AcquisitionTimeBase
implements Serializable

Exposes information about a Persistit Tree.

getFetchCounter

public long getFetchCounter()
Returns:
the count of Exchange.fetch() operations, including Exchange.fetchAndStore() and Exchange.fetchAndRemove() operations.

getTraverseCounter

public long getTraverseCounter()
Returns:
the count of Exchange.traverse(com.persistit.Key.Direction, boolean) operations including Exchange.next() and Exchange.previous().

getStoreCounter

public long getStoreCounter()
Returns:
the count of Exchange.store(com.persistit.Key, com.persistit.Value) operations, including Exchange.fetchAndStore() operations.

getRemoveCounter

public long getRemoveCounter()
Returns:
the count of Exchange.remove() operations, including Exchange.fetchAndRemove() operations.

getStatus

public String getStatus()
Return the status code for this Tree.

Returns:
the status code

getWriterThreadName

public String getWriterThreadName()
Return the name of the Thread that currently holds a writer (exclusive) claim on the Buffer if there is one, otherwise returns null.

Returns:
The thread name, or null if there is none
